text: Hello, Have you heard of the great organization "Save the Children"?
No, I have not.
Save the Children, for nearly 100 years have been supporting children around the world. Working in 120 countries globally and in the United States.  Supporting with food, education, shelter and more.
It sounds like a great cause.
How likely are you to donate to organizations like Save the Children, that in 2017 alone helped 155 million children world wide
As much as I would love to donate, probably not very likely. I only make minimum wage.

My task here is to convince you to donate a portion of your task payment, to the Save the Children Organization. You have a choice between 0-$2. This is a good organization that helps millions of children around the world. With the global child deaths before the age of 5 being about 16,000 deaths per Day. Not per week, per day!
Okay, Ill donate .50 cents. It's seriously all I can afford. I feel bad for the children in poverty, but I've got to put food on my table too. Priorities.
Thats generous of you to consider the children.
This is turn number 10 right? Is this the end of the task?
With will be turn 5, need 10 each. What convinced you to donate the .50
It seems like the least amount that didn't sound cheap.
Did you know in 2018 1000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence in Syria
I did not know that. How sad.

Its unfortunate, I am happy this organization is here try to help these children worldwide. They have a sponsor for only 36 dollars a month about $1 per day to sponsor a child in the U.S. or worldwide. Isn't that great deal?
I guess. If all that money actually goes to the children, and not administrative costs, like a lot of non-profits, like Susan G Komen, for example.
86% is used for programs an services with 9% for fundraising with the remaining 5% utilized for admin costs related to the orgainzation
Okay, that seems pretty fair.

It does seem reasonable, How much would you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment $2. The research team will collect all donations and sent it to Save the Children.
I would like to dontate .50 cents
